output.sentences: My family is always happy to get together for the holidays.
The kids nicely prepared the food for the first time this year.
Some of the family left after dinner but most stayed until late into the night.
We've gathered at many places for the holiday season but I think we finally found a location we will go back to every year.
The whole family agreeded to the new location and we've already set up plans for next year.
